title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Interactive Learning for Real-Time Online Language Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language skills, capable of fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve intermediate-level communication skills through real-time language interaction in an online environment
Learners complete at least 80% of collaborative tasks with peer learners using digital tools
Learners reduce language usage errors by at least 50% based on weekly feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
